00011 typedef struct _proxy_request {
00012         void *con; /* a pointer to the client-connection, (type: connection) */
00013 
00014         time_t added_ts; /* when was the entry added (for timeout handling) */
00015 
00016         struct _proxy_request *next;
00017 } proxy_request;
00018 
00026 typedef struct {
00027         proxy_request *first; /* pull() does q->first = q->first->next */
00028         proxy_request *last; /* push() does q->last = r */
00029 
00030         size_t length;
00031 } proxy_backlog;
